author: jt.aussiegingersnap
title: Game Token Design [Revelar + Duo]
description: Stable & successful NFT gaming rewards and token models are largely unknown and often only reward a few players.
solution: Development of a set of foundational math models that are freely available and that can be used to design tokens for new games using CNFTs
experience: Benjamin Beer - Lead researcher with a focus on mathematical modeling, game theory and the blockchain.
